short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps students with VHL Central assignments by providing a answer guide with detailed explinations sourced from Quizlet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create an answer guide with solutions and explinations to any VHL exercise. VHLFans finds Quizlets with answers to your VHL exercise and uses GPT-4o to provide explinations.

VHLFans is a fully featured plugin that:
ðŸ”Ž Finds the most reliable Quizlets using Google and ChatGPT
ðŸ“š Orders answers to match the Vistas answers so in case the losers at VHL HQ randomize the order, you're in A+ shape!
ðŸ’¡ Explains answers you based on the context of the lesson, so even though you're not a loser actually doing your VHL, you still learn!

Come join us in the post-VHL world.
